item.title: Building Complex Side Projects With Purpose - Dev Leader Weekly 105
item.description: Welcome to another issue of Dev Leader Weekly! In this issue, I discuss building side projects, adding complexity, and doing so intentionally! Link to article: https://www.devleader.ca/2025/08/09/building-complex-side-projects-with-purpose-dev-leader-weekly-105

item.title: Weekly Recap - 2025-08-08
item.description: Check out this week from Dev Leader! Here's a list including articles and videos on software engineering, career development, and programming in C#! Link to article: https://www.devleader.ca/2025/08/09/weekly-recap-20250808
